alert.note: Alert for Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 8:12PM CDT until further notice by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MILLS AND NORTHEASTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 810 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Plattsmouth, or 4 miles southeast of Offutt AFB, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. This storm has a history of producing large hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glenwood. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
